data.name: ID3707
data.value: ID3707: The value '{0}' is not a valid OAuth grant_type.

data.name: ID3708
data.value: ID3708: Access token request should have a valid value specified for the grant_type, client_id and client_secret.

data.name: ID3709
data.value: ID3709: The value '{0}' is not a well-formed Uri.

data.name: ID3710
data.value: ID3710: Access token request with authorization code should have a valid code and redirect_uri parameters specified.

data.name: ID3712
data.value: ID3712: The parameter 'expires_in' should be an integer that gives the number of seconds the access token is valid.

data.name: ID3711
data.value: ID3711: Access token response message should contain a valid access_token specified.

data.name: ID3713
data.value: ID3713: The parameter 'error_description' cannot be set to an empty string.

data.name: ID3714
data.value: ID3714: The parameter 'error_uri' should be set to an Absolute Uri.

data.name: ID3715
data.value: ID3715: Error response message should have the 'error' parameter set to a valid value.

data.name: ID3717
data.value: ID3717: The value '{0}' is not a valid OAuth 'response_type'.

data.name: ID3716
data.value: ID3716: EndUser authorization request requires the 'response_type', 'client_id' and 'redirect_uri' to be specified.

data.name: ID3718
data.value: ID3718: EndUser authorization response message should either have the 'code' or the 'access_token' parameter specified.

data.name: ID3719
data.value: ID3719: The parameter 'scope' cannot be set to an empty string.

data.name: ID3720
data.value: ID3720: The parameter 'state' cannot be set to an empty string.

data.name: ID3730
data.value: ID3730: An invalid OAuth message was received.

data.name: ID3731
data.value: ID3731: An error occurred while reading or writing an OAuth message.

data.name: ID3721
data.value: ID3721: The HTTP method '{0}' and HTTP Content type '{1}' is not a supported combination.

data.name: ID3722
data.value: ID3722: The HTTP method '{0}' is not supported.

data.name: ID3741
data.value: ID3741: Authentication type '{0}' is not valid.

data.name: ID3723
data.value: ID3723: Unable to construct a valid OAuth message from the given set of parameters.

data.name: ID3724
data.value: ID3724: Cannot serialize the OAuth message of type '{0}'.

data.name: ID3750
data.value: ID3750: The redirect_uri does not match the Uri registered with the current client_id.

data.name: ID3751
data.value: ID3751: The client_id could not be verified.
